Class Application

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      Application
All Implemented Interfaces:
Listener, java.lang.Runnable
public class Application
extends java.lang.Thread
implements Listener

A simple test application.

The class is a thread which simply goes on forever waiting for a slow process to signal its termination. In the meanwhile, it prints a timestamped message every 2 seconds.

The class is itself a listener and uses the received signals to determine whether or not to terminate.

Author:
Cristiano Sadun
